backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining departments, semesters, subjects, resources, and user profiles with access control and admin‑only mutation methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing an admin‑gating fix and the related frontend files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files used as reference metadata for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, themes, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint containing root mount node and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Admin route guard handling login, permission loading, error states, and explicit admin denial before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHelpS: Help panel explaining how admins can add resources via file upload or external URL with tips for organization.
frontend/src/components/admin/Department: Manages departments and subjects with dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting, using catalog data and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResourceMa: Provides UI for adding, editing, and deleting study resources, flattening department data and supporting file or URL uploads.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity and handles authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main page layout with header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the site footer with branding, admin link, and external Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the site header with navigation, logo, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/resources/EmptyS: Shows a centered empty-state card with icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: Provides search and filtering controls for resources by department, semester, subject, and type.
Displays a list of resources with type badges and open links, optionally showing department context.
frontend/src/features/admin/resourceMuta: Defines React Query mutations for adding, editing, and removing resources, each invalidating the departments query after success.
frontend/src/features/admin/structureMut: Provides mutations to manage departments and subjects, calling actor methods and refreshing the departments query on completion.
frontend/src/features/admin/useAdminStat: Fetches admin status for the current identity using React Query, with custom loading behavior tied to actor readiness.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSea: Implements client-side filtering of resources by keyword, hierarchy IDs, and derived resource type.
frontend/src/features/catalog/useCatalog: Loads all departments via actor.getAllDepartments using React Query when an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto-refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with academic-themed color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/resourceType.ts: Derives a resource type from its title or URL by checking keyword patterns, returning a standardized category.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with tabs for resource and structure management behind an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Provides UI for browsing departments, semesters, and subjects, handling loading states and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero, feature highlights, and navigation buttons for browsing and searching materials.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Loads departments, flattens resources, applies keyword and filter-based search, and displays filtered results or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Fetches department, semester, and subject data to show a subject’s resources or a not-found/empty state with breadcrumb navigation.
frontend/src/utils/semesterSort.ts: Provides a utility to sort semester objects by extracted numeric order with a string fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, clearing, and managing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and pending feature requests related to fixing admin access and seeding admin state.
